strapiPost.title: 4 For All
strapiPost.content:
All bikes welcome - this Saturday (Nov. 13) kicks off a cyclocross race series that will be 4 races over 4 days in 4 cities in Northwest Arkansas.

  • Get ready: ALL Cross will begin in Fayetteville at Centennial Park and proceed over the next few months on unique courses in Springdale, Rogers, and Bentonville. The events will feature short skill clinics and “micro-cross” races to accommodate all levels. 
  • Purpose: Spectators are encouraged to come and watch this family friendly event. Because cyclocross is about community and fun, each day of racing will have an after party as all events should.

For more information and to register, click HERE.
